articles.author: Tom LoBianco, Manu Raju and Miranda Green, CNN
articles.title: House intel chairman stepping aside from House Russia investigation
articles.description: House intelligence chairman Devin Nunes announced Thursday he was temporarily stepping aside from leading the investigation into Russia's meddling in the 2016 elections.

articles.title: Turkish autopsies confirm chemical weapons used in Syria attack that killed scores
articles.description: Syria denies ever using chemical weapons, alleges incident due to leak of rebel chemical agents.

articles.author: Matt Flegenheimer
articles.title: G.O.P. and Democrats Set to Collide on Filibuster and Supreme Court
articles.description: If a Democratic filibuster holds, Republicans have pledged to abandon long-held practice and lift President Trump’s nominee, Neil M. Gorsuch, with a simple majority vote.

articles.author: http://www.facebook.com/alimvitali
articles.title: After a campaign spent bashing China's trade practices, Trump and President Xi Jinping will meet
articles.description: While the Chinese are strategic and conservative in their policy and diplomacy maneuvers, Trump has earned his reputation as brash and unpredictable.

articles.author: Peter Baker, Maggie Haberman and Glenn Thrush
articles.title: Trump Removes Stephen Bannon From National Security Council Post
articles.description: The shift, orchestrated by Lt. Gen. H. R. McMaster, will also restore the positions of senior military and intelligence officials who had been downgraded.

articles.author: Euan McKirdy, CNN
articles.title: ISIS kills 33 execution-style in Syria; 22 in Iraq attack
articles.description: ISIS killed 33 people execution-style in eastern Syria on Wednesday, according to a monitoring group.

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/mradamtaylor
articles.title: Putin’s ex-wife returns to the spotlight with a dashing young husband and a fancy French villa
articles.description: A rare glimpse into the secretive Putin family life.

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Aung San Suu Kyi: No ethnic cleansing of Myanmar Muslim minority - BBC News
articles.description: The Nobel peace prize winner says the term is "too strong" to use, in an exclusive BBC interview.

articles.author: James Griffiths and Chieu Luu, CNN
articles.title: South China Sea: Duterte orders Philippines military to occupy islands
articles.description: Philippines President Rodrigo Duterte said Thursday he has ordered military personnel to occupy all Philippines-claimed islands in the disputed South China Sea.

articles.author: Devon Armijo, KCRA.com
articles.title: Woman falls off Northern Calif. bridge while taking selfie
articles.description: The woman, whose identity has not been released, and a group of her friends were walking on the catwalk underneath the 730-foot-tall bridge when she tried to take a selfie and fell 60 feet onto a trail below, the sheriff's office said.
